post.body: Grock thanks, sweetie. i need a freakin vacation! arrrrggg! lmao lmao.
gaia68. well, i hope u make it *that long... lmao
LilD Thank u very much. we're very excited that things have prgressed well this year. yaaay us! (thats it, i promise)
: i know im l8 but congrats! im jealy. LilD: u better keep ur eye on Gaia, she gets crazy ideas when she's inibriated & left alone.
grock: its quite alright. i respect ur opinion & ur feelings abt a person that has affectd some1 u love. besides, it was prolly 4d best.
gaia68 im lusciously sorry abt that.
Gaia68: oooo. i really want to hear that! I was singing the pot pie song to u Gaia. its baking in the oven right nowww. so excited.
GRock wow. lmao! well, there is a bit of common sense involved when operating a movg vehicle. there's a reason why its illegal.... oops!
LilD and ~aia sorry ladies. its aaaaaallll gone! my hunny, my roomie and me ate it up!
Gaia68 - I know u wouldve been proud of my turkey soup. it had sweet potatoes, gnocchi, veggies and tukey w a condsnd shroom+chicken base!
wowwee. lol. have fun yous guys.
gAia68 ROTFLMAO! how did u respond to that burning question?
LilD whats CET? Country entertainment tv?
u mean Black Entertai... i mean Black EVIL Television? no way.
Gaia68 yaaaaay you! congrats!
its water sitting out to let the chrlorine purge out. its for the fish tank silly...
jasminesherman we thought u meant central station in nyc.... had an "ah-ha" moment!
lmao
Gaia68...i ...d....k... have no idea!
t2dab i think u shld call grandpa but all he's going to say is "im not gay" grandpa is all about the bitches. (mr bitches, that is)
Gaia DISCUSTO ! in t2dab's word "BLASPHEMY!!!"
just had a mass evacuation for a fire alarm. saved by the bell. oh well, time to go back already. i hoped it wouldve lasted a little longer!
im overwhelmed. smh.
got written up today for performance last month... idk how they decipher who they write up bc only 6 pple out of 48 made sales goals.
got a letter in lieu of a 5 day, non paid vacation for my 6 minute tardy on friday. next time im 31seconds l8, im outta work.
thats usually where u get couseled or written up for something. pray for me children!
I am 84% of my sales goal for this month, which is great considering we're only starting the 2nd week. i do *however hv development time ...
no. were certain that theyre jammin. were also certain that they r very old and white indeed.
no. more like 102%, w a 2% margin of error, of course. lmao. lmao.
i kno it's illegal (in our relationship) to use the cell while on a date, but I must say that GRock & I r havng a *great time @ Cajun Queen!
yaay! LilD be careful n dont let ur motorcycle mama buy a Harley!
had dinner 4 a bff's bday at a nice Tuscan grille. now watchn harry potter w my fav poodle, M. i feel a Potter marathon coming on...
Lmao!
no. im high so i am also lusciously thankful
i did love it. yes its condition reminded me but not to the point of non usage. anyways, i respectd ur opinion to fung it and chuckd it.
watching the tv version of Tales from the Hood. wow
next time u visit... or if me and G get to visit u n LilD...Ill whip u up some. i sent a pict, tho. enjoy!
(singing in grandad's tune) pot pie...pot pie...pot piiiiiieeee !
the turkey soup and make it into a ginormous pot pie. think it can be as lusciously delicious as the 1st time? i hope so!
sigh... 2day was a much better day than any other day this week insomuch as it was not *as overwhelming. thank goddess. about to remasterize
please dont pull out ur hair Gaia. and dont grow it out for that purpose! hope everything goes ok for u...
so glad to hear ur enthusiasm, babe! u really will do well, u were qe for pete's sake! lol
well anything heavy will give u the itis. whether it be a Luther Burger in bbq or a lambchop covered in fancey french sounding shit... lmao!
lmao lmao lmao smh
what type of beans are biracial ?
U ARE horrible! u ought to b ashamed!
Uh uh. wish i could be a fly on the walls...
Lmao!
(singing) booty butt cheeks. booty butt cheeks. booty booty booty booty booty butt cheeks!
just saw a mini doc of a lady w no arms...yo thats freakishly cool! she went grocery shopping , driving, changd babys diaper- all w/o help!!
i finally got visitation 4m my ex for my big Ssssshhhheeeeebbbbaaaa. im so excited to see her! :-0)
t2dab called me & offered me a dollar to walk over to the lady aforementioned, punch her n the face and tell her "its not 1992, bitch!" lmao
okay, last observation I promise. (t2dab wl app this) she has "boots w the fur" and an updo w twists goin up the back...
ooo. just realized the print on her shirt matxhes them both...did i miss something or am i jumping to conclusions? lmao
there is a grown ass woman w embroidered flowers down her jean pantleg. the jeans match the embroidery on her jacket. y lord y? fashionista?
feelin good n minorly f'd up. life is finally good for the moment.
Ooo. do tell...
oooo. i have to facebook -befriend you...
in rebuttal: i dont care! we *could use it. we could also do w/o it...whatev. im still in opposition!
lmao @Gaia... i kno rite?! typo - its human... now the shamwow...thats just down right unforgivable
i request for all of GRocks *real tweeps to chastize her for buyg a friggin shamwow. T2daB already gave her a beatin in the mid of the mall!
night night Gaia
they sell EVERYRTHING at walmart! i dont envy the person who has to put up all 50000 lights!
awwwwwweeeeeeesssssssoooooommmmeeeee!!!
peeing on myself laughing!
rotflmao! ! ! rotfpoml!
please
wow. i can imagine! if gas prices were still high, she should have it sound likl mr duboius getting anally raped.
i wld love to walk out of this building &never return. it's so freaking stressful! i need to intern for some1. any takers? i cook, too! :-)
butter rum?! i have a bunch of wierdo's for a baby daddy & baby daddy bff in-law... sheesh! i bet yall like cucumbers & mint chocolate too!
glad u wont be l8 to work.
